summary: Skyrim is a freezing cold snowy waist land with a chilling and unforgiving surface, but this ENB will make the fear go away. This ENB focuses on the sky and horizon lighting. The chilling cold horizon stays white but as you look up you see the beautiful blue sky.
descriptionHtml:
Requirements

Should have computer that can run game on high to ultra.

Features
Only minor FPS drops (5-15 loss)
Slightly impairs far vision(realistic)
Blue, beautiful skies
Glossy reflection from armors during the day, subtle reflection at night
Controlled exposure
Star filled sky
Subtle depth of field
AO
Realistic and detailed shadows
More aurora borealis
light fog gives off snowy feel of Skyrim
Extreme indoor light intensity  


Permissions
I\'m fine with you altering the ENB for PERSONAL USE ONLY. if you want less bloom, be my guest and alter it for yourself. DO NOT REPOST THIS AS AN ALTERED FILE. If you would like to make a less bloom option or better performance version, ask me. I will upload it to the optional files and give you full credit for making that version.
author: FubbaYouCubba
